C3: Choose an ascii-label of the object.
Choose a tex-label of the object.
A comma-separated list of managed variables may be given. The manage variables can later be matched to the variables of a polynomial ring. The other variables can be used as parameters.
The well-formed sequence of expressions in ascii text format, separated by commas.
The finite field of coefficients in the expression.
Consider the expression vector as a matrix with $r$ rows, read in row-major ordering.
Compute the symbolic determinant of the source object $s$. The object $s$ must be a square matrix.
Compute the characteristic polynomial of the square matrix $s$ using the variable $\lambda$.
Substitute the values $v$ for the variables $t$ in the expressions given in $s$. $v$ and $s$ must be vectors of the same length.
Compute the right nullspace of the object $s$, which must be a fully numerical matrix.
Compute the $(i,j)$-minor of the matrix object $s.$ $s$ must be a square matrix.
Compute the right nullspace of the object $s$, which must be a symbolic matrix.
Stack the given matrices in the list vertically. The matrices must have the same number of columns.
